item.title: Bell Rung for Hiroshima
item.description: Yesterday at 4:15PM (Pacific) I took a break from the chaos of networks and enjoyed a ceremonial oneness to honor the victims of Hiroshima in a gesture of world-wide harmony. hiro1615080508shima starts about a minute before I rang in concert with many others across the globe for the Hiroshimia Peace Memorial Ceremony. The recording was done in our garden walkway among our tropicals and succulents, you can hear the neighbor’s roof-top AC droning in the background, accompanied by our other neighbor’s dog.
